TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Mid-melee, however, HAL 9000 joins in.

I wish for an 'all natural, organic, Martian-grown potato'.

It rotted on the six month journey here.

 

I wish I had more NKS downloads

Edited February 11, 2017 by Mr. Me

Granted, they also download Russian hacker viruses

 

I wish for an omelette

Granted. You drop it.

I wish that someone would grant this wish that is to grant a wish that is to grant a wish that is to grant a with that is to...

Granted, but you turn into a Penrose triangle.

I wish Star Chart would tell me history facts in the morning instead of when I'm about to go to bed.

Granted. Now you're nocturnal.

I wish I could change the material of objects in Blender from object mode instead of needing to go into edit mode.

Granted. Universe firmware gets updated.
You now can edit all around you with Blender in Edit Mode.
But the Universal Unity engine is now incompatible with changed objects and runs you in sandbox mode.

I wish the Universe were written in C++17 instead of what it's written in now.

Granted. There is a coding error in line 487174818829, however, so the universe doesn't work anymore.

I wish for pizza.

Granted. However, it comes with 2 extra servings of anchovies. 

I wish for more time to play KSP!

granted, you lose all of your money and die of starvation due to you only playing KSP

I wish that the people of earth could listen to an argument and not say something like REKT or ROASTED or something stupid like that

Granted. All people listen patiently, and then give you alternative facts without actually addressing your statement. 

I wish I could make mods!

Granted, they are like that burger rocket mod

i wish They wouldn't cancel the amazing world of gumball

Granted, but they instead cancel your true favorite show.

I wish I didn't sprain my wrist.

Granted. You didn't. That's somebody did it for you/

Meanwhile They are trapped. They must but can't cancel the amazing world of gumball which is @StupidAndy's favorite show.

I wish them a luck.

Granted. It's bad luck.

I wish for UP #4014's restoration would finish faster.

Done, however the tracks were recycled to rebuild it. You've got  nowhere to go!

 

I wish for a fish in a knish...

Granted, but it's a fish in a box

 

I wish i wasn't in prison

 

Just kidding, i'm not in prison.

Just now, TheKorbinger said:

Just kidding, i'm not in prison.

Highlight it.

Edited March 29, 2017 by TheKorbinger

Granted, you are now in the Gulag.

 

I wish for a cheese omelet

Granted. You fry together three cheese eggs and hen milk.

I wish you like it.

Granted. He liked your stinky foot better.

 

I wish ffor rhe worst thing ever. (try ruining that)

Granted, you receive blutwurst in herring broth.

I wish for a nice steak.

But it is rotten

I wish for a better computer

Granted. You get a Sinclair ZX80. It's better than than paper and pencil!

 

I wish for a better job.

Granted, but you are fired immediately, before you begin working.

I wish for a bacon.

Sure, but it is facon as you are a vegetarian.

I wish for lent to be over

(mods: are we allowed to talk about religion in the forum?)
